testScenarios.name: Quarterly Strategic Planning
testScenarios.description: Executive processes multiple strategic inputs from department heads

inputs.title: API Performance Optimization Initiative
inputs.description: Current API response times are impacting executive dashboard performance during peak usage
inputs.rootCause: Inefficient database queries and lack of caching infrastructure
inputs.businessImpact: Reduced executive productivity and delayed strategic decision making

inputs.title: Sales Process Digitization Project
inputs.description: Manual sales processes are creating bottlenecks in deal closure and forecasting accuracy
inputs.rootCause: Legacy CRM system and manual data entry requirements
inputs.businessImpact: Longer sales cycles and reduced revenue predictability

inputs.title: Remote Work Policy Enhancement
inputs.description: Current remote work policies need updating to support hybrid executive decision-making
inputs.businessImpact: Reduced employee satisfaction and executive oversight challenges

testScenarios.name: Crisis Response Workflow
testScenarios.description: Urgent cross-departmental issue requiring rapid executive coordination

inputs.title: URGENT: Customer Data Security Incident
inputs.description: Potential data breach detected in customer database requiring immediate executive response
inputs.businessImpact: Potential customer trust loss and regulatory compliance issues

testScenarios.name: Multi-Department Strategic Initiative
testScenarios.description: Cross-functional project involving multiple teams and complex stakeholder coordination

inputs.title: Digital Transformation Strategy
inputs.description: Company-wide digital transformation affecting all departments and requiring coordinated executive leadership
inputs.rootCause: Outdated technology stack and manual processes across departments
inputs.businessImpact: Competitive disadvantage and operational inefficiency across organization

inputs.title: Customer Experience Platform Integration
inputs.description: Integration of customer experience tools across sales, marketing, and support requires executive coordination
inputs.rootCause: Siloed customer data and inconsistent experience delivery
inputs.businessImpact: Inconsistent customer experience and lost revenue opportunities
